events.title: The Grand Communion & Covenant Night
events.description: A sophisticated evening of liturgical worship and partaking in the table of the Lord to seal the year's covenant.

events.title: Marketplace Mastery: Excellence Seminar
events.description: Strategic insights for professionals and entrepreneurs to dominate their industry through Biblical principles and kingdom excellence.

events.title: Night of 10,000 Hallelujahs
events.description: An immersive, high-praise experience featuring an orchestral ensemble and a mass choir bringing down the manifest glory of God.

events.title: The Leadership & Impact Summit
events.description: A gathering of visionaries and leaders aimed at building structural integrity and spiritual authority in global ministry.

events.title: Prophetic School of Ministry
events.description: A deep dive into the mysteries of the Word and the operation of the gifts of the Spirit for the modern believer.
